column11: We develop GPU adaptations of the Aho-Corasick and multipattern Boyer-Moore string matching algorithms for the two cases GPU-to-GPU (input to the algorithms is initially in GPU memory and the output is left in GPU memory) and host-to-host (input and output are in the memory of the host CPU).
